channel.title: Sushi.Net on Shoko
channel.description: Recent content in Sushi.Net on Shoko

item.title: Introducing Sushi.Net
item.description: While we continue working on the next release of Shoko (coming soon!), one of our devs has been working on a side-project for some time now and has released a public beta which we wanted to highlight and what better time than right before we say goodbye to 2020 and hello to 2021. Introducing Sushi.Net, A .NET Port of Sushi For those not familiar, sushi is a Python script that allows you to remux releases with ease regardless of audio and/or subtitle source.
